channel.title: Little problem
channel.description:
Well my friend made a 317 the source is Empirescape V2 and when he talk with NPC's its auto shut down the client and restart it. If you guys could help with this problem he will be glad.
Client DL: http://uppit.com/v/OIPIKU2W
Server DL: http://uppit.com/v/LY98ZZQN

item.title: Little problem
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

It’s not cause of my server or client, he showed me on msn the problem.
Everytime the client shuts down he gets an error txt file.

Read full topic

item.title: Little problem
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

[quote=“Epic Ancient, post:6, topic:300440”][quote author=Your Master link=topic=396714.msg2946591#msg2946591 date=1252251473]

Tell him to look into what the NPC ID is, and then search it in client.java, and see what’s making it do that.
[/quote] Can’t you try to fix it. He doesn’t have knowledge with clients.

If he has teamviewer, yes.
If not, you’ll have to post every bit of coding relating to the problem.
–I can help with most any 317 problem (editing and error fixing) via teamviewer.[/quote]

He has, add masterofmoneyluke@hotmail.com on msn

Read full topic
